article.title: Garstka Assigned to Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics)

tags.tag: Office of the Undersecretary of Defense for Acquisition

article.text: John J. Garstka has been appointed to the Senior Executive Service and is assigned as the deputy director, cyber, Office of the Undersecretary of Defense (Acquisition, Technology and Logistics), Washington, D.C.
